org.exist.storage.journal
Class Lsn

java.lang.Object
  org.exist.storage.journal.Lsn

public class Lsn
extends Object

Log Sequence Number: identifies a log record within the journal file. A LSN is represented by a Java long and consists of the file number of the journal file and an offset into the file.

Author:
wolf
